name: Flora (itch) (LDF Productions)
description:
You are an astronaut who finds himself in a planet where hailstorms and lava rains can happen in any minute.

Keep alive your little plant by watering it and not letting it burn with lava drops.

TIPS!
  • Lava drops can evaporate the water from your bucket.
  • Your umbrella will break after several hits.
  • Your plant doesn't take damage from ice drops.
  • Keep your bucket equipped if you want to fill it.
  • Your plant will grow through time.

This game was made in 72hs by LDF Productions for Ludum Dare 46

Hope you all enjoy it.
